dmca.title: REMOVED AT SUBMITTER'S REQUEST Strike One for Pitchcounter.Com
dmca.body:
Dear PitchCounter.com,

I represent the owner of [private], which is also marketed under he name Pitch Count.  My client is licensed by Little League.  It has been made aware of your website, which infringes on its trademarks and on its copyrrihted marketing material.  In addition, your domain name is confusingly similar to my client's registered trademarks.  This is a cease and desist letter.  It is not our object to bring litigation. rather, my client will not pursue its legal rights if you take the following steps:
1. Change your name to something that is not close to Pitch Count.
2. Stop using the marketing copy.
3. Change the domain name to something that is not close to Pitch Count.
4. Send us confirmation you will take these steps immediately, and verification once you have done so.

If I do not receive prompt assurance of compliance, we will have to pursue our legal rights.
